message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this product to you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on a high-quality item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,000. This is a competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you taking the time to discuss this.  While I value the product, $11,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now.  I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $11,000 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,800. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
